General.Name: Alignment Healthcare LLC
General.Description: Alignment Healthcare, Inc. operates a consumer-centric healthcare platform for seniors in the United States. It delivers customized healthcare experience to meet the needs of seniors through its Medicare Advantage plans. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Orange, California.
